/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are muted, with shades of gray and green dominating the palette.
